## Resources.Resource.getCandidatesForContext() method

Gets the candidates for this resource that match the specified [context](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextdecl.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCandidatesForContext(context: Context.IValidatedContextDecl, options?: Context.IContextMatchOptions): ReadonlyArray<ResourceCandidate>;
```
